resources.string: %1$d items added to AnkiDroid, %2$d duplicates not added
Couldn\'t get permission to access the AnkiDroid database

Place your text files into directory:
%s

Each line should correspond to a note and contain two semicolon-separated fields.
Deck name is file name without extension with each `.` replaced by `::`.

After that re-open this application, long-tap a filename and press "share" button.
